main.name: Iryna Slynko
main.bio: I love coding, challenges and problem solving. I am on track to receiving a BSc Hons from Technological University Dublin in Computing with IT Management. I am also studying at National College of Ireland towards Higher Diploma in Science in Software Development (Java). I am currently upskilling to become a Full Stack Software Engineer.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Delivered features for the web app solution (Python, Debugging, Unit Testing, Refactoring, Code Review, Javascript, React, Jira, Git, Wiki page creation) as well as proposing improvement of onboarding and mentoring. Winner of Global Hackathon in Dublin (Java Spring). Top 10 in 2021 EMEA Secure Code Warrior Tournament.

work.title: Software Engineer Associate/Apprentice
work.description: Trained in creating event-driven C# applications, OOP, Agile, IT Security and Software Design Principles. Shadowing Software Engineers on the Yahoo! ad platform, participating in scrum meetings. Participated in diversity and inclusion events, eco initiatives.

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description: Web development, client meeting participation, version control, Agile, demoing, code review and data migration project (Javascript, SOQL, Salesforce, Git).

work.company: CSInc - Computer Science Inclusive - Science Group
work.title: Software Development Contributor
work.description: Developed software system recognizing handwritten surveys and feedback and storing the processed data in the database (ASP.NET MVC, C#, CSS, Javascript, SQL, Azure Vision API, Unit testing, Kanban board, Git).
